results.input: I've been in the industry since the iPhone was first released. Currently leading infrastructure at Netflix. - David Kim

results.input: Hi, I'm Jennifer. I work at Google. Actually no wait, I left Google last month. I'm now at Anthropic as a Research Scientist. Been doing ML for 4 years.

results.input: URGENT: Meeting at 3pm! BTW my colleague Sarah (the PM) wanted me to forward her resume: 'Maria Santos, Staff Engineer @ Uber, 7 yrs exp'. Can you review?
